title: #88: Er Ah, Sports (Bill Burr)
itunes:title: Er Ah, Sports with Bill Burr
description: Bill Burr and I sat out on the patio of the Comedy Store one day and talked about Boston Sports. Bill grew up a homer in the homerist city in America. Sports, comedy, and conspiracy theories are all I want to talk to him about. It was a fun discussion and a good hour before we even got to the sports talk.
